article.headline: Santa Clara 78, Pacific 76
article.story: SANTA CLARA, Calif. -- Kevin Foster scored 26 points, and Evan Roquemore scored 14 and dished out 11 assists as Santa Clara beat Pacific in overtime 78-76 Saturday. Santa Clara (7-3) trailed 67-63 with a minute remaining before scoring six of the next seven points in the game, including a 3-point shot by Foster that tied the game at 69-69. Following a Pacific turnover, Roquemore missed a potential game-winning 3-pointer for Santa Clara as time expired. After the teams traded baskets, Santa Clara seized a 5-point lead with less than a minute remaining. Pacific's comeback fell short when Ray Cowels III sank two free throws to make it a two-possession game with 16 seconds left. Pacific (4-5) was led in scoring by Lorenzo McCloud with 22 points, including 11 for 12 from the free throw line. Foster is now No. 4 on the all-time WCC three-pointers list with 282.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
